DOC.brief_summary: The study is conducted in Asia. The aim of this observational study is to evaluate the weight change from baseline while using Levemir® in subjects with type 2 diabetes mellitus under normal clinical practice conditions in India.
DOC.brief_title: Observational Study of Safety and Efficacy of Levemir® in Type 2 Diabetes
DOC.criteria: Any subject with type 2 diabetes Subjects with a hypersensitivity to insulin detemir or any of its excipient Children below 6 years Subjects who are pregnant, lactating or planning to become pregnant
